articles.title: European Union strikes deal to ration natural gas amid Russia cut-off fears - CBC News
articles.description: EU energy ministers approved a draft European law meant to lower demand for gas by 15 per cent from August through March.
articles.content:
European Union governments agreed Tuesday to ration natural gas this winter to protect themselves against any further supply cuts by Russia as Moscow pursues its invasion of Ukraine.
